summary: CONSUMER STATED THE TRANSISTOR BOARD THAT COMPLETES THE CONNECTIONS TO THE WIPER MOTOR, FAILED ON MANY OCCASIONS.  THE WIPERS WOULD WORK FINE ON A DRY/SUNNY DAY, BUT IF IT  WERE HUMID/FOGGY, THE WIPERS WOULD FAIL.  THE DEALERSHIP WAS CONTACTED AND  STATED IT WASN'T A SAFETY ISSUE, AND THE CONSUMER HAD THEM REPLACED.  SCC *JB
